author: Simon Difford
description: Aromatic peach is surprisingly strong in this refreshing and light drink.Also, consider serving as a Spritz: Pour 90ml/3oz Prosecco, 45ml/1.5oz Peach & Orange Blossom and 60ml/2oz soda water into an ice-filled glass and briefly stir.
name: Peach & Orange Blossom Seltz
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Peach & Orange Blossom Botanical Spirit

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
